browsers.name: Mozilla Firefox
browsers.description: Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser developed by Mozilla. Firefox has been the second most popular web browser since January, 2018.

browsers.name: Google Chrome
browsers.description: Google Chrome is a web browser developed by Google, released in 2008. Chrome is the world's most popular web browser today!

browsers.name: Microsoft Edge
browsers.description: Microsoft Edge is a web browser developed by Microsoft, released in 2015. Microsoft Edge replaced Internet Explorer.
